name: Moon Path (Duong Vu)
description:
Let's travel to the Moon (using a non-traditional mean)! 

Control a projectile as it makes its way to the Moon. Avoid obstacles to prevent crashes and successfully land on the surface of the Moon.

This project is an entry to 2020's Game Off Jam: ThaiDuongVu/MoonPath: Entry to 2020's Game Off jam (github.com)
